description:
Note: This content is also included in the "Dress-Up Costume Set for 16 Playable Characters" that is available as a separate purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

Special Juvia Costume: Dress-Up is added.

Note: Costumes can be changed from the "Dresser" at "Lucy's House" after advancing the game to a certain point.
name: Juvia's Costume "Dress-Up"
